name: Sudoku Zen
description:
Play the classic Sudoku game with all of your friends live on the Sudoku Zen mobile app. Whether they're on iPhone, iPad or iPod, download Sudoku Zen and start playing. Game plays are synced in real-time to give players the best gaming experience.
Don't like to play online? Then try our offline play mode. We have infinite puzzle generations.
Came across a puzzle you like to know the solution to? Use our Sudoku solver to solve your custom puzzle.
